item.title: Pulse: Crowd sensing for smarter cities
item.description: Overview The advent of smart cities has increased the demand for agile and effective governance. This paper presents a prototype at the proof of concept stage, called “Pulse”. The system comprises of – a mobile app for citizens to submit feedback, a web dashboard for district administrators and government bodies to push close-ended questions based on locality, gender, age group and time, and a network of eddystone beacons that pushes close-ended questions about urban spaces, creating a hyperlocal crowdsensing framework in the Indian context.
